summary: This mod replace vanila armor and clothes with remodeled equipment (armor and clothes) for females based on UNP and UNPB body type.
descriptionHtml:
[center][b][size=4]THIS MOD IS A FREE PRODUCT, CREATED OUT OF A PERSONAL LOVE FOR SKYRIM AND WITH RESPECT TO COMMUNITY. AS SUCH, THIS MOD WILL ALWAYS REMAIN FREE OF CHARGE, AND I DO NOT WANT ANY OF THIS MOD'S ASSETS TO BE USED FOR THE PAID MODS ON THE STEAM WORKSHOP; THAT INCLUDES THE 3D MODELS, TEXTURES AND EVEN ESP/ESM FILES AS MASTER DEPENDENCIES.[/size][/b][/center]

[img]http://imageshack.com/a/img163/8735/uxes.png[/img]

[img]http://img815.imageshack.us/img815/8328/title01.png[/img]

***Important***
Requirements:
1) Skyrim patch v1.9.32.0,
2) DIMONIZED UNP female body by dimon99 (http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709/)
**OR**
UNP BLESSED BODY- UNPB REDUX PROJECT by Blessed Redux Project team (http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37900/)
3) XP32 Maximum Skeleton -XPMS by xp32 (http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26800/)
***

(v1.2 and newer with panties - 18 types of them added to every armor and cloth. You can see all panties on screenshots.)

This MOD adds remodeled equipment (armor and cloth) for females based on UNP and UNPB body type. Some armor and cloth use bouncing boobs.
I used awesome mods of other authors (with permissions) to combine most beautiful and immersive parts of armor, when i edit them all in 3dsmax and did a lot of new textures.
First I intended to do this for myself, because i cant play Skyrim with standart non-formed armor.
None of armor consist underwear, because i think its not immersive for medieval lore of Skyrim and its looks more sexy ).

Also i fix some bugs (like different cloth use same textures) and drawretex over 100 new textures. Models i used from popular remodel plugins (see full list of authors in credits). Every armor edited by me in 3dsMax.

I tested it - should wok fine without clipping issues or whatever..

Optionaly you can install boots with heels for armor.

This mod dont change armor and cloth from Dawnguard or Dragonborn addons.


IMPORTANT:
* Mod may conflict with other plugins that change vanilla armor (not Dawnguard or Dragonborn) and dealing with skeleton.
* You can use mods, that change armor from Dawnguard or Dragonborn freely.
* Mods that enhance armor textures will work.
* Mod will conflict with "Lower 1st Person Weapons" (http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26764/). Thanks jschott for noticing.

[img]http://imageshack.com/a/img14/2374/qdnx.png[/img]

[img]http://img338.imageshack.us/img338/4347/ntitle01.png[/img]

V1.3:
====
Armor and clothes dont use non-standart slots (44-61).
Compatibility patch for SoS, Devious Devices and other mods that use non-standart slots (44-61).
Farmer clothes 03 still using 49 slot.

V1.2:
====
Added 18 types of panties to every armor and clothes.
You can see all panties on screenshots.

V1.1:
====
Fixed "burnt Astrid body" effect on npc.

[img]http://img594.imageshack.us/img594/4840/ntitle02.png[/img]

-no location-

[img]http://img839.imageshack.us/img839/2603/ntitle03.png[/img]

1. Extract the files to a temporary location.
2. Examine the folder structure and make corrections where necessary.
3. Copy files to (install folder)Steamsteamappscommonskyrimdata
4. Start Skyrim Launcher, click 'Data Files', place a checkmark beside the UNPNaughtyRemodel.esp.

[img]http://img440.imageshack.us/img440/3388/ntitle04.png[/img]

1. Unequip all armor from your character (make himher naked).
2. Save game. Quit game.
3. Start Skyrim Launcher, click Data Files, uncheck the UNPNaughtyRemodel.esp
4. Delete the files/folders associated with the mod.

[img]http://img845.imageshack.us/img845/6651/ntitle05.png[/img]

Email: odemhouse@gmail.com

[img]http://img259.imageshack.us/img259/4058/ntitle06.png[/img]

Thanks to Bethesda for creating Skyrim.

Thanks to all authors - i realy appreciate their contribution to Skyrim modding. They did big work and now we can play with normal models of armor and body )

All of the armors meshes within this compilation belong to the their authors (see credits). I combined them and modified from clipping issues of different parts. Most of textures belongs to me, but some of them just retex and belong to

original authors.

If you wish to modify this mod, you have to ask permission from brokefoot, Nightasy, Theminblack, MrTroubleMaker, Crosscrusade and you must give original credits from this readme to all authors including me.

You are not allowed to re-host this file without explicit permissions of all authors from credits.
You are not allowed to upload this file to Steam.
author: Odem
